languages.text: Атаки существа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} накладывают {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}. Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают метку скверны на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and curse {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets with a mark of corruption for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают метку скверны на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature's melee attacks inflict burning and curse hit targets with a mark of corruption for 1 round unless they pass a Willpower resistance test.

This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and curse {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets with a mark of corruption for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}击中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，并获得“腐化印记”，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and curse {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets with a mark of corruption for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}击中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，并获得“腐化印记”，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}を与え、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃した{/g}ターゲットに呪いをかけて腐敗の印を与える。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。
languages.original_text: This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and curse {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets with a mark of corruption for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}を与え、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃した{/g}ターゲットに呪いをかけて腐敗の印を与える。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} de esta criatura infligen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y maldicen a los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} con una marca de corrupción durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} a menos que superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and curse {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets with a mark of corruption for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} de esta criatura infligen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y maldicen a los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactados{/g} con una marca de corrupción durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} a menos que superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} dieser Kreatur fügen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} zu und verfluchen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele mit einem Mal der Verderbnis für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}, es sei denn, sie bestehen eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and curse {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets with a mark of corruption for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} dieser Kreatur fügen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} zu und verfluchen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffene{/g} Ziele mit einem Mal der Verderbnis für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}, es sei denn, sie bestehen eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de cette créature infligent les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et Marque de Corruption aux cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, sauf si elles réussissent un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} de cette créature infligent les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et Marque de Corruption aux cibles {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchées{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, sauf si elles réussissent un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}.
